title: Brand: Wiha / Part #: 28372
body_html:
Item #: 32814295
Brand: Wiha
Model #: 28372

Product Specifications

Set Type 7 Piece insulated Slimline Blade Set; Slotted 2.5, 3.5, 5.5mm, Phillips #1, #2, Square #1, #2
Tip Type Slotted; Phillips; Square
Container Type Plastic Card
Drive Size 4.0 mm
Insulated Yes
Includes Wiha 28319 - Insulated SlimLine Blade Phillips #2 (OAL 3?); Wiha 28317 - Insulated SlimLine Blade Phillips #1 (OAL 3?); Wiha 28312 - Insulated SlimLine Blade Slotted 5.5mm (OAL 3?); Wiha 28307 - Insulated SlimLine Blade Slotted 2.5mm (OAL 3?); Wiha 28310 - Insulated SlimLine Blade Slotted 3.5mm (OAL 3?); Wiha 28347 - Insulated SlimLine Square Blade #2 (OAL 3?); Wiha 28346 - Insulated SlimLine Blade Square #1 (OAL 3?)
Number Of Pieces 7
Features 4.0mm slim diameter; Chrome-vanadium-molybdenum steel, through-hardened, titanium silver; Very slim blade diameter for hard to reach screws; Individually tested to 10,000 volts AC and rated to 1,000 volts AC for safety and peace of mind; Made in Germany
Length (Inch) 5-1/2 in
